fields.name: DisplayAttendeeInfo_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Attendee Search


Search for the attendee below. If you can not find the attendee, select Create New.

fields.name: spacercomplete
fields.fieldText:
.

.

.

.

fields.name: dispTextComplete
fields.fieldText:
Check In Complete!

A Dreampass was emailed to "{!objAttendee.PersonEmail}". Have them use this to gain access to all Salesforce Spaces.



Note: this Dreampass will be valid for 36hrs. Please inform them to receive an onsite PCR test (if they haven't already done so) to extend the Dreampass for the remainder of the event.

fields.name: DisplayAttendeeInfo_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Create New Attendee


Make sure to verify with Splash team that this attendee is authorized to be given a Dreampass. Then enter attendee information below.
